dmca.title: Police du Net DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
Object: Link redirecting to Quebecor Media Distribution Select illegal products

Links:
http://www.torrentfrancais.com/streaming/bran-van-3000-glee/10546605/
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3874123
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5041539
http://www.sumotorrent.com/en/details/1970965/Bran-Van-3000-discography-%283-albums%29.html
http://bigdonald.org/bran-van-3000-rose-2007-electronic/lvjjn
http://www.torrentroom.com/torrent/66185-Bran-Van-3000-Rose-2007-Electronic-www-torrentazos-com-rar.html
http://www.onlytorrents.com/torrent/bran-van-3000-glee-40;1998-41;-insinuendo:1022cf8a2c2952717c0bc7ffe68e3d257ad9d2ad
http://www.bittorrent.am/download-torrent/3996192/5/0/Bran%20Van%203000.html

The registered French office Police du net and its legal representative Dominic Morissette , Director of Police du net.
We have noticed that some of our client Distribution Select product is available without our prior authorization. 
It concerns the following album :

Détails
Artist: Bran Van 3000
Album: Discographie
Copyright Owner: Distribution Select
Agent Authorize: Police Du Net

In these circumstances, we ask you to remove and to ban any search queries that may contain links concerning this album in agreement with your DMCA policy.

I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Distribution Select and their artist, Canada (If you need the document approval reply me with your email and i will send it to you)

I have a good faith belief that use of the aforementioned material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanks for your comprehension and the artist work
Best regards,
Dominic Morissette 
admin@policedunet.com
Police Du Net, PDG
281 de la réserve
Quebec,Ca
G7J 3N3
418.550.3812
